sqlMap.select:
select b.* from ( select rownum rn, a.* from ( select unq,title,pass,name,content,hits,to_char(rdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') rdate from mvc_board
where $searchGubun$ like '%$searchText$%'
order by unq desc ) a ) b where rn between #startRow# and #endRow#

select count(*) total from mvc_board
where $searchGubun$ like '%$searchText$%'
select unq,title,pass,name,content,hits,to_char(rdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') rdate from mvc_board where unq = '$unq$'
sqlMap.update: update mvc_board set hits = hits + 1 where unq = #unq#
